  rename(A = A.drs) %>%

## Data for rug plots
## (using geom_point instead of geom_rug so that the instruments can be on their own line.)
fscores.drs <- getSavedata_Data("cfa-drs-3.out") %>%
  setNames(tolower(names(.))) %>%
  select(recordid, f) %>%
  rename(DRS = f)

fscores.mdas <- getSavedata_Data("cfa-mdas-3.out") %>%
  setNames(tolower(names(.))) %>%
  select(recordid, f) %>%
  rename(MDAS = f)

fscores.cam <- getSavedata_Data("cfa-cam-3.out") %>%
  setNames(tolower(names(.))) %>%
  select(recordid, f) %>%
  rename(CAM = f)

fscores <- fscores.drs %>%
  left_join(fscores.mdas, by="recordid") %>%
  left_join(fscores.cam, by="recordid") %>%
  gather(test, fscore, 2:4) %>%
  mutate(fscore.y = ifelse(test=="DRS", 190,
                    ifelse(test=="MDAS", 192.5, 195)))
